name: Newfound Health of Galodus
text:
Newfound Health of Galodus

Once, I had a chancre or two
The pain would rage and I would too,
My mind grows weak, thinking of ways
Ways that I could stop the pains

Alchemy, stories, and hypnotists
Could not stop the bloody cysts
Arcane legend and sorcery
Was the way I've healed my knee

So adventurer hear my plea!
When you hear or see,
A blightened person in pain
You now have the knowledge to heal
Although you may not see material gain
You have the honor of one new feel....
Generosity.
